And <S%G2532><s%> when they had bound <S%G1210><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they led him away, <S%G520><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> governor. <S%G2232><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> I have sinned <S%G264><s%> in that I have betrayed <S%G3860><s%> the innocent <S%G121><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> is that to <S%G4314><s%> us? <S%G2248><s%> see <S%G3700><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> to that.

And <S%G1161><s%> they took <S%G2983><s%> counsel, <S%G4824><s%> and bought <S%G59><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> potter's <S%G2763><s%> field, <S%G68><s%> to bury strangers in. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5027><s%> <S%G3581><s%>
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> field <S%G68><s%> was called, <S%G2564><s%> The field <S%G68><s%> of blood, <S%G129><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> this day. <S%G4594><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> potter's <S%G2763><s%> field, <S%G68><s%> as <S%G2505><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> appointed <S%G4929><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> governor: <S%G2232><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> governor <S%G2232><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> sayest. <S%G3004><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> a notable <S%G1978><s%> prisoner, <S%G1198><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Barabbas. <S%G912><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> were gathered together, <S%G4863><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> ye that I release <S%G630><s%> unto you? <S%G5213><s%> Barabbas, <S%G912><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> which is called <S%G3004><s%> Christ? <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> persuaded <S%G3982><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should ask <S%G154><s%> Barabbas, <S%G912><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> destroy <S%G622><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> governor <S%G2232><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Whether <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> twain <S%G1417><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> ye that I release <S%G630><s%> unto you? <S%G5213><s%> <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Barabbas. <S%G912><s%>

He saved <S%G4982><s%> others; <S%G243><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> he cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> save. <S%G4982><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> he be <S%G2076><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> let him now <S%G3568><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cross, <S%G4716><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we will believe <S%G4100><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

He trusted <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> let him deliver <S%G4506><s%> him <S%G846><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he will <S%G2309><s%> have him: <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> land <S%G1093><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> of them that stood <S%G2476><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> that, said, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> man calleth <S%G5455><s%> for Elijah. <S%G2243><s%>
